name: multi-scrobbler
tagline: A service for syncing music listening history across platforms
description: Multi-Scrobbler pulls listening data from multiple music services like Spotify and Last.fm and sends scrobbles to multiple platforms. It runs as a self-hosted background service with a minimal web configuration UI.

features.title: Multi
features.description: Pull playback data from Spotify, Plex, Jellyfin, Subsonic, and other music services simultaneously

features.title: Multi
features.description: Send listening history to Last.fm, ListenBrainz, Maloja, and multiple tracking platforms at once

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Scrobble tracks as you listen with minimal delay for accurate listening history across services

features.title: Duplicate Detection
features.description: Prevent multiple scrobbles of the same track when listening across different sources

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Set up sources and destinations through a web interface without editing configuration files

features.title: Offline Queue
features.description: Store scrobbles locally when services are unavailable and sync when connection is restored

features.title: Custom Rules
features.description: Filter or modify scrobbles based on artist, album, or track criteria before sending to platforms

features.title: Background Service
features.description: Run continuously as a daemon with automatic restart capabilities and minimal resource usage
